SQL.LOAD: SELECT code, description, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, schedule_id FROM elp_schedule WHERE schedule_id = :schedule_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT code, description, created_by, modified_by, created_date, modified_date, schedule_id FROM elp_schedule WHERE 1=1 --dynamic_where_clause AND ROWNUM < :row_num
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_schedule SET code = :code, description = :description, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE schedule_id = :schedule_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_schedule ( code, description, created_by, schedule_id ) VALUES ( :code, :description, :created_by, :schedule_id )
SQL.LOAD_LIST_SCHEDULE: select s.SCHEDULE_ID, s.CODE, s.DESCRIPTION, ss.SERVICE_SCHEDULE_ID, ss.SERVICE_CLASS_ID, ss.SERVICE_TYPE_ID, ss.SCHEDULE_ID, ss.SERVICE_CENTER_ID, ss.EFFECTIVE, ss.EXPIRATION, s.CREATED_BY, s.MODIFIED_BY, s.CREATED_DATE, s.MODIFIED_DATE from elp_schedule s join elp_service_schedule ss on s.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id where ss.service_center_id = :service_center_id
SQL.GET_SERVICE_CENTER_SCHEDULE_DETAIL: select sd.SCHEDULE_DETAIL_ID, sd.SCHEDULE_ID, sd.DAY_OF_WEEK_ID, sd.FROM_TIME, sd.TO_TIME, sd.CREATED_BY, sd.MODIFIED_BY, sd.CREATED_DATE, sd.MODIFIED_DATE from elp_schedule_detail sd join elp_schedule s on sd.schedule_id = s.schedule_id where s.schedule_id = :schedule_id
SQL.GetScheduleDetailCount: Select SCHEDULE_DETAIL_ID from elp_schedule_detail where schedule_id=:schedule_id
SQL.GetScheduleDetailInfo: select SCHEDULE_DETAIL_ID, SCHEDULE_ID, DAY_OF_WEEK_ID, FROM_TIME, TO_TIME, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE from elp_schedule_detail where schedule_id=:schedule_id
SQL.GetScheduleInfo: Select code, description from elp_schedule where schedule_id=:schedule_id
SQL.GET_DUPLICATE_SCHEDULE_COUNT: Select count(*) from elp_schedule where upper(code)=:CODE and schedule_id <>:schedule_id
